rows.label: qst001101_msg001
rows.name: Hmmm... If I do this to that...

rows.label: qst001101_msg002
rows.name: Then that will become this...

rows.label: qst001101_msg003
rows.name: This is it! I've got it!

rows.label: qst001101_msg004
rows.name: Hmm? And who might you be?

rows.label: qst001101_msg005
rows.name:
I see. No wonder I
didn't recognize you.

rows.label: qst001101_msg006
rows.name: My name is Silvio.

rows.label: qst001101_msg007
rows.name:
Smithing is a hobby of mine.
I leave the business side of
things to the young ones.

rows.label: qst001101_msg015
rows.name:
If you have any requests, feel
free to ask. If I'm in the mood,
I might just make it for you.

rows.label: qst001101_msg016
rows.name: ...Oh, dear me.

rows.label: qst001101_msg017
rows.name:
I almost forgot the
brilliant idea I just had.

rows.label: qst001101_msg018
rows.name:
Well, you see, I just had an
idea for a new accessory.

rows.label: qst001101_msg019
rows.name:
When it's finished, it
will be something the world
has never seen before!

rows.label: qst001101_msg020
rows.name: But I'm missing the key materials...

rows.label: qst001101_msg021
rows.name:
Could you gather them for
me? If you do, I'll give you
the finished accessory.

rows.label: qst001101_msg022
rows.name:
I just want to create.
So, what do you say?

rows.label: qst001101_msg023
rows.name:
Oh! You'll do it? Thank you! I'm
glad I met such kind young people.

rows.label: qst001101_msg024
rows.name:
The materials I need are
a Pione Stone and Gorilla
Hair Bristle (temp).

rows.label: qst001101_msg025
rows.name:
You can often find Pione Stones
in the rocky areas of Invidia.

rows.label: qst001101_msg026
rows.name:
You might be able to get
Gorilla Hair Bristle (temp)
by defeating ●● in ××.

rows.label: qst001101_msg027
rows.name: I'm counting on you.

rows.label: qst001101_msg101
rows.name:
You can often find Pione Stones
in the rocky areas of Invidia.

rows.label: qst001101_msg102
rows.name:
You might be able to get
Gorilla Hair Bristle (temp)
by defeating ●● in ××.

rows.label: qst001101_msg103
rows.name:
Bring them to me before
I kick the bucket.

rows.label: qst001101_msg201
rows.name:
You should be able to get
Sea Lizard Scales (temp)
by defeating △△ in ××.

rows.label: qst001101_msg202
rows.name:
You should be able to get
Seabird Feathers (temp)
by defeating ■■ in ××.

rows.label: qst001101_msg203
rows.name:
With these, I can create a
one-of-a-kind accessory!
